short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control the speed of your video!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a speed control extension that could help you speed up the video play rate. There are a few existing button for user to quick choose the playing rate and also adjusting rate for user to input.
